title: Inner Healing
description:
Inner Healing 
Music for Healing and Meditation
by His Holiness Sri Ganapati Sachchidananda Swamiji
Label: Datta Yoga Center USA
Genre: New Age
       2004 

192 kbps VBR MP3 Audio Files 
   Album Cover Art 


This Healing Music is for Mental depression.
His Holiness Sri Ganapati Sachchidananda Swamiji and Dr.L.Subramaniam&#039;s electrifying violin accompaniment 
takes the listener to ethereal worlds of pure bliss and ecstasy. 
The music is basically contemplative, arousing meditative and peaceful emotions.

1.Jai Jai Ganapathi

2.Shantirastu Pushtirastu

3.Mangalam



As one of the rare living Avataras...His Holiness Parama Pujya Sri Ganapati Sachchidananda Swamiji
 is the Pontiff of Avadhoota Datta Peetham at Sri Ganapati Sachchidananda Ashrama in Mysore, India. 
Sri Swamiji is renowned for His Healing and Meditation music and He is considered a divine guide
 who cultivates the ancient Vedic traditions. 
He was born fully realised in command of the eight Mahasiddhis and is a Guru in the 
Dattatreya Avadhoota lineage. 

Sri Swamiji honours all religions and teaches that it&#039;s possible to reach God by many paths.
 "It is of primary importance to attune with God through prayer, worship and the chanting of God&#039;s holy names".
 "Then God Himself will give you good guidance" says Sri Swamiji.


ENJOY the Music
Lets Pray for the World
